description:
In the community app after clicking on cancel button,  "Required Field" gets populated in the particular page.
Moved over from - https://mifosforge.jira.com/browse/MIFOSX-2513
For example, In organisation >> manageoffices >> Create Office page if Cancel button is clicked then "Required Field" will get populated. 

Issues exist in pages are listed below (will be updated as it is found) :- 

- [ 1 ]  Create Office page

- [ 2 ]  Create Holiday page 

- [ 3 ] Products >> Savingproducts >> Create savingproducts
name: Mifos X Web App - 'Required Field" Should Not Get Incremented After Clicking On Cancel Button
